content: materials 4 skeins of purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organic cotton each skein is approximately 279 yards/ 100 grams - color a 2 skeins approximately 390 yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 225 yards required - color c 1 skein approximately 240 yards required note these are enough materials to make a set of three slip_stitch dishtowels one of each pattern or 4 skeins of louet s euroflax 100% linen each skein is approximately 270 yards/ 100 grams - color a 2 skeins approximately 390 yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 225 yards required - color c 1 skein approximately 240 yards required note this is enough yarn to make these three dishtowels plus one more you will also need… - us 3 3 25 mm straight or circular needles 2 - if using straight needles two us 3 double pointed needles 3 for i-cord gauge 23 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished dimensions 11 ¼ x 17 ¼ inches notes for the indigo euroflax dishtowels we used color a cream color b caribbean blue color c navy for the natural cotton pure dishtowels we used color a egret white color b freshwater pearl color c birch bark 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888
